name: Powerpuff Girls: Mojo Jojo's Pet Project
name_original: Powerpuff Girls: Mojo Jojo's Pet Project
description:
Powerpuff Girls: Mojo Jojo's Pet Project is an arcade game developed by BAM! Entertainment. It was originally released in 2001. BAM! Entertainment published the game.
Powerpuff Girls: Mojo Jojo's Pet Project is available on PC.
